column1: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing (US East (N. Virginia))

In order to reduce the cost of the system, the first option was to reduce the EC2 instance costs. Instead of using m5.4xlarge instances, I decided to use m5.2xlarge instance type. I could decrease the server count and keep the type same, however, I thought it would be better to keep the server count and reduce their performance. 

The second choose to reduce the cost was to select a lower performance RDS server. I decided to use m4.2xlarge server and reduce the backup size. I did not change the Multi-AZ deployment option because I think this is essential for data persistency. 

I did not change storage and data transfer related services as they limits are reasonable for this app requirements.
